instruction: In the Calendar app, locate the event scheduled on June 10, 2050, then in the Reminders app, create a reminder with the same title that is due next week at 9:00 AM.

command: osascript -e 'tell application "Calendar"' -e 'if not (exists calendar "Team Presentations") then make new calendar with properties {name:"Team Presentations"}' -e 'tell calendar "Team Presentations"' -e 'make new event with properties {summary:"Team Presentation", start date:date "June 10, 2050 at 10:00 AM", end date:date "June 10, 2050 at 11:00 AM"}' -e 'end tell' -e 'end tell'
